verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> the principles <S%G746>of<s%> the <S%G3056>teaching<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, let us go <S%G5342>on<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G5047>perfection<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

Of the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G909>baptisms<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2917>of<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> will we <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2010>permit<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for those who <S%G5461>were<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G5461>enlightened<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of <S%G1431>the<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> <S%G4487>the<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>,

<S%G2532>If<s%> they shall fall <S%G3895>away<s%>, to renew <S%G340>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>; seeing they <S%G388>crucify<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G388>again<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> put him to an open <S%G3856>shame<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> drinks <S%G4095>in<s%> the <S%G5205>rain<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> brings <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G1008>herbs<s%> <S%G2111>suitable<s%> for <S%G1565%G99999>them<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1090>tilled<s%>, <S%G3335>receives<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> if it <S%G1627>bears<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5146>briars<s%> it is <S%G96>rejected<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is close <S%G1451>to<s%> being <S%G2671>cursed<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G2740>burned<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> better <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G1487>salvation<s%>, <S%G2532>though<s%> <S%G2980>we<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> to <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1731>shown<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, in that you have ministered <S%G1247>to<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> do <S%G1247>minister<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> we desire <S%G1937>that<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> do <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G4710>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the full <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> you <S%G1096>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3576>slothful<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of them <S%G2816>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1861>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1861>promised<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G1893>because<s%> he <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%>, he <S%G3660>swore<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>,
<S%G2229>Saying<s%>, <S%G3375>Surely<s%> <S%G2127>blessing<s%> I will <S%G2127>bless<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiplying<s%> I will <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%>, after he had patiently <S%G3114>endured<s%>, he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> something <S%G3187>greater<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G3727>oath<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G951>confirmation<s%> is to <S%G846>them<s%> an <S%G4009>end<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G485>strife<s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1014>willing<s%> more <S%G4054>abundantly<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> to the <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G1860>promise<s%> the <S%G276>immutability<s%> <S%G1012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%>, <S%G3315>confirmed<s%> it by an <S%G3727>oath<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>immutable<s%> <S%G4229>things<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it was <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie<s%>, we might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3874>a<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>consolation<s%>, who have fled for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> upon the <S%G1680>hope<s%> set before <S%G4295>us<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G949>steadfast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which is <S%G2082>inside<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%>;

<S%G3699>Where<s%> the <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> <S%G1525>has<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G1096>made<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>.
